backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control, data maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, and activity tracking, plus associated types.
backend/migration.mo: Contains migration logic and data type definitions to map old actor state to the new actor state during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with favicon and meta tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global toaster, including the SavedLiliesPage route.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button using useBookmarks to mark or unmark lilies without navigating.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty file placeholder for comment item component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty file placeholder for emoji reactions component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive navigation header with search, avatar, mobile menu, and creation shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper handling header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer with auto-close on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar component rendering navigation links and recent activity items, with active-route highlighting and optional mobile drawer styling.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with avatar, metadata, image handling, and actions like like/share/bookmark using various query hooks.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the LeftSidebar that manages body scroll lock and slide-in panel behavior.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls, with loading states and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a threaded ribbit (comment) with replies, like actions, user avatar, indentation, and reply form handling.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts computed from fetched data with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and provides helper functions to toggle, add, remove, clear, and read bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login state, identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, user profiles, memberships, and related ICP backend data via the actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility styles for hover effects and icon sizing.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats numbers into shortened units such as k, M, and B with simple rounding logic.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily URL using the Web Share API with fallback to clipboard copy and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Handles username, user ID, and Froggy Phrase management using localStorage, including hashing, obfuscation, backups, and restore logic.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements a per-lily view cooldown using localStorage to track timestamps and prevent repeated increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page describing the platform, key features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with loading states, join status, and navigation to pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating a lily with text, image, or link, including pond selection, tag suggestions, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a pond with images, froggy phrase validation, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed showing lilies sorted by trending or new, with search support and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with ribbits, likes, views, and view-count increment logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays detailed pond info, moderators, membership status, and allows leaving the pond with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s feed with lilies, join status, banner, and sidebars, handling loading and missing-pond cases.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies, loading individual items and allowing removal of missing or saved posts.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies filtered by tag with sorting, canonical tag redirects, and related pond info.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, joined ponds, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, layout, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current feature set and schema version, listing frontend routing/layout, theming, navigation, sidebars, discovery widgets, and Internet Identity authentication along with detailed backend capabilities for ponds, lilies, ribbits, tags, profiles, usernames, media, and activity tracking.
